channel.title: [PI] HELP Click a chest for exp
channel.description: I want to make it where u can click something for exp so the skill is trainable like some servers do with chests. But I'm doing this for agility so I'll do this with some agility item IDK what. It will be simple I dont care if u actually go through it or anything I just want you to get the experience. It's simple.

item.title: [PI] HELP Click a chest for exp
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]ActionHandler. firstClickObject.

case OBJECT_ID: return c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp, skillID);[/quote]
Wait noooz
i get this

cannot return a value from method whose result type is void
                                                                      return.cgetPA().addSkillXP(500, 16);
                                   ^

:\

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] HELP Click a chest for exp
